title: Strengthening Requirements Analysis and Design Inference Competencies Under Constraints: Applying Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Language instruction design competency development for adult learners with intermediate language proficiency in smartphone-centric constrained technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify core learning gaps with 80% accuracy by linking needs analysis and design assumptions in given educational scenarios.
Learners can systematically document decision-making processes using think-aloud protocols in ≥3 design sessions under mobile environment constraints.
Learners can propose actionable instructional strategies considering ≥4 constraint factors (time, technology, resources, etc.) in real-world language education design tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
